collection.name: Salt Samurai
collection.openText: Salt crystals, weak but indestructible, are used to bring souls to peace during the time of war.

specialTipSize.specialTip: An employee who completes work on $0 received a blessing. That employee will be referred to as T-05-61-1.
The blessing had an effect on T-05-61-1 when they were ordered to suppress an Abnormality two or more levels below their level.
The bless also had an effect on T-05-61-1 when they were ordered to suppress an Abnormality two or more levels above their level.
T-05-61-1 took a small amount of WHITE damage for each attack in combat due to the indignity of bullying an Abnormality whose danger level is two below their own.
T-05-61-1 healed a small amount of SP for each attack in combat due to the heartiness of battle against an Abnormality whose danger level is two above their own.
*Research Record* T-05-61-1, when attacking an Abnormality two levels above them, dealt extra damage with each attack when strengthened by $0, and gained a small amount of lifesteal.
